name: Liquid Foundation
description: Buildable, lightweight liquid foundation that blends evenly and lasts up to 12 hours. Infused with hydrating hyaluronic acid for luminous, natural finish. SPF 15.

name: Concealer
description: High-coverage concealer with creamy texture to cover discoloration and brighten under-eye area without creasing. Long-wear, lightweight finish.

name: Pressed Powder
description: Ultra-fine pressed powder to set makeup, control shine, and blur imperfections. Ideal for touch-ups on the go. Non-cakey finish.

name: Blush (Powder)
description: Silky powder blush that blends easily and provides a natural flush of color. Long-lasting and pigmented for easy application.

name: Highlighter
description: Soft-focus highlighting powder that gives skin a radiant, luminous glow without visible glitter. Layer for subtle to intense highlight.

name: Bronzer
description: Warm-toned bronzer to add sun-kissed warmth and subtle contour. Matte and blendable formula for natural-looking dimension.

name: Eyeshadow Palette
description: Multi-finish palette with mattes, satins and shimmers. Highly pigmented formula that blends easily and is crease-resistant.

name: Mascara
description: Volumizing mascara with buildable formula to lengthen and define lashes while resisting smudging and flaking.

name: Liquid Eyeliner
description: Precision liquid liner with ultra-fine tip for effortless wings and precise lines. Quick-dry, long-lasting and transfer-proof.

name: Pencil Eyeliner
description: Creamy pencil liner that glides smoothly for soft, smudged looks or precise definition. Long-wearing and easy to blend.

name: Eyebrow Pencil
description: Fine-tip eyebrow pencil for natural hair-like strokes and precise shaping. Smudge-resistant and long-lasting.

name: Eyebrow Gel
description: Lightweight gel to tame brows and set them in place while adding subtle definition. Tinted wearable color for fuller look.

name: False Eyelashes
description: Cruelty-free false lashes with comfortable lash band for easy application. Reusable and blends well with natural lashes.

name: Matte Lipstick
description: Long-wear matte lipstick with a velvety finish. High pigment formula that stays comfortable on the lips.

name: Lip Gloss
description: Non-sticky gloss with high shine and cushiony feel. Can be worn alone or layered over lipstick.

name: Lip Tint
description: Long-lasting water-based lip tint that gives diffused, natural color. Lightweight and buildable for subtle or bold looks.

name: Lip Liner
description: Creamy lip liner to define, shape and prolong the wear of lipstick. Sharpens to a fine point for precise application.

name: Primer
description: Silicone-free primer that smooths skin, minimizes pores, and extends makeup wear. Lightweight and breathable.

name: Setting Spray
description: Hydrating setting spray that locks in makeup for 12 hours. Refreshing feel and fine mist finish for all skin types.

name: Makeup Brush Set
description: Professional-grade vegan brush set with essential shapes for perfecting foundation, eyes, and lips. Durable, soft synthetic bristles.
